title: Alleged drunk driver hits pedestrian and flees the scene in N.H., police say
author: John Waller
bullets: Crime The 24-year-old woman is facing multiple charges.

By John Waller November 20, 2025 | 12:38 PM 1 minute to read A 24-year-old woman is facing multiple charges after she allegedly hit a pedestrian in New Hampshire while driving drunk and then fled the scene.
Heaven Martin, of Newbury, is charged with aggravated DUI and felony conduct after an accident following the Tuesday evening incident on Route 103 in Sutton, which is northwest of Concord.

title: Which Mass. hospitals rank highest in patient safety?
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Health New grades from an independent watchdog group show how Massachusetts hospitals compare in various measures of patient safety.
Massachusetts General Hospital in Boston.
